colors.M: Material makes use of color property for its button component to set its color.
colors.B: Bootstrap uses the variant property to set the color as well as other variant for the button.

disabled.C: For disabling a button, both Material & Bootstrap uses 'disabled' attribute for the element

sizeVariants.M: Material has three sizes available for buttons, large, medium & small which could be applied to its size property/attribute.
sizeVariants.B: Bootstrap provides only two sizes, lg : large & sm: small .These could be applied to their respective size property.

icons.M: Material have icons lib named @mui/icons-material used for importing material icon component. It provides Button with attributes like endIcon & startIcon to place the icons at the end or start of the button respectively.
icons.B: In Bootstrap , bootstrap-icons is the lib for using its icons via classes provided to the tags. You need to place them manually where you want your icon to occur.

colors.M:
<Button variant='contained' color='primary' > Primary Default </Button> 
 <Button variant='contained' color='secondary' > Secondary </Button> 
 <Button variant='contained' color='success' > Success </Button> 
 <Button variant='contained' color='error' > Error </Button> 
 <Button variant='contained' color='info' > Info </Button> 
 <Button variant='contained' color='warning' > Warning </Button>
colors.B:
<Button variant='primary' > Primary Default </Button> 
 <Button variant='secondary' > Secondary </Button> 
 <Button variant='success' > Success </Button> 
 <Button variant='danger' > Danger </Button> 
 <Button variant='warning' > Warning </Button> 
 <Button variant='info' > Info </Button> 
 <Button variant='light' > Light </Button> 
 <Button variant='dark' > Dark </Button>

disabled.M:
<Button disabled variant='contained' color='primary' > Disabled </Button> 
 <Button disabled variant='outlined' color='primary' > Disabled </Button> 
 <Button disabled color='primary' > Disabled </Button>
disabled.B:
<Button variant='primary' size='lg' disabled> Disabled </Button> 
 <Button variant='outline-primary' size='lg' disabled> Disabled </Button>

sizeVariants.M:
<Button variant='contained' color='primary' size='large'> Contained Large Button </Button> 
 <Button variant='outlined' color='primary' size='medium'> Outlined Medium Button </Button> 
 <Button color='primary' size='small'> Default variant Text & Small Button </Button>
sizeVariants.B:
<Button size='lg'> Default Primary Button & Large size </Button> 
 <Button variant='outline-secondary' size='sm'> Outlined Small Button </Button>

icons.M:
<Button endIcon={<SendIcon />} variant='contained'> Send </Button> 
 <Button startIcon={<PrintIcon />} variant='outlined' color='info'> Print </Button>
